item.title: Output a sortable HTML table
item.description: A while back I posted a script that would take whatever input it got, into a sortable HTML table in a file. Last night my family was here, and they wanted to see the Eurovision song contest thing, so I had some time to rewrite the script into a PowerShell V2 Advanced function, that supports pipeline input.
